Package org.tmotte.tmplz.util

Class Log

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tmotte.tmplz.util.Log

  • public class Log
extends java.lang.Object
    For internal use. This is the passthru point for all logging. It looks for a java.util.logging.Logger mapped to "org.tmotte.tmplz". No, we aren't using log4j because it's not a J2EE standard. Meh.

      • bufferEverything

        public static void bufferEverything​(int maxBufferSize)
        If this is invoked, messages don't go to the log, but instead to an internal static buffer. Use getBuffer() to retrieve the messages.
